thread.title: Justin Timberlake Danced With Celebs During His Oscars Performance, and It Got Awkward

author: Quinn Keaney
title: Justin Timberlake Danced With Celebs During His Oscars Performance, and It Got Awkward
text:
Justin Timberlake Dancing With Celebrities at 2017 Oscars Justin Timberlake Danced With Celebs During His Oscars Performance, and It Got Awkward February 26, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Justin Timberlake Danced With Celebs During His Oscars Performance, and It Got Awkward 
In one of the most joyous Oscars openings in recent years, Justin Timberlake danced his way around the Dolby Theatre in LA on Sunday night while singing his Oscar-nominated "Can't Stop the Feeling." After breaking it down on stage, the professional photobomber moved to the celebrity-packed audience to get them to join in the fun. Although Nicole Kidman and Halle Berry were happy to show off their moves, there were a few who were a little, shall we say, hesitant (*cough* Ryan Gosling *cough*). Hey, at least he got a kiss out of wife Jessica Biel for his efforts! Related:
